original_text: Baruch wrote down on a scroll the words that Jeremiah told him to write. That happened in the fourth year that Josiah's son, Jehoiakim, ruled Judah as king. At that time, Jeremiah said to Baruch,
korean_text: 유다의 요시야 왕의 아들 여호야김 넷째 해에 네리야의 아들 바룩이 예레미야가 불러 주는 대로 이 모든 말을 책에 기록하니라 그 때에 선지자 예레미야가 그에게 말하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Baruch wrote down on a scroll
the words that Jeremiah told him to write
That happened in the fourth year
that Josiah's son, Jehoiakim, ruled Judah as king
sentences.korean_translation: 요시야의 아들 여호야김이 유다를 왕으로 다스리던

sentences.original_text: At that time, Jeremiah said to Baruch,
